choices: A man jumps to his death from the Broolyn Bridge.
A mind controlled assisin goes on a shooting spree in a Manhatten shopping mall.
An unattended toddler drowns in the bathtub in Harlem.
A drug dealer sells bad herione to his customers and they all die.
Lady JaGa is killed by her handler breaking her programming one too many times.
1.content:
At five fifty-five AM Rockford sits his coffee down on the coffee table and leans forward focusing on the mysterious news anchor. I wonder what's going to happen today he thinks as the man on the supernatural channel begins to report tomorrow's bad news.

Which story does Rockford decide to change?
1.title: The HERO Channel Breaking News

choices: He waits and then bangs on the door every five minutes.
He goes around the back, hoping a window to Tom's place is unlocked.
Rockford loudly breaks the door down.
Rockford tries to get the maintainance man to open the door.
11.content:
The man's name was revealed by the mysterious news anchor on the HERO channel. Tom Brody, lives in a dilapidated building in Brooklyn, which is an all too common sight being grossly neglected by the owner who is an uncaring slum lord living high on the hog in a penthouse somewhere upstate.

Tom Brody began drinking heavily after his wife divorced him for cheating and he lost his job. Tom became severely depressed after he began to commit crimes to get rent money to support his drinking habit. Now a debased alcoholic criminal, his family has disowned him.

The pain was too much and today was the day Tom decided the pain would end. He passed out drunk at twelve after three this morning knowing somewhere in his murky thoughts he would have to decide how to do it later.

Rockford found out Tom Brody's address and went to his place at seven o'clock, only one hour after watching the broadcast.
Brody was still out cold and could not hear the knocking at his door.

What does Rockford do?
11.title: A man jumps to his death from the Broolyn Bridge.

info.brief_description: FanFiction: Early Edition spin-off of unofficial sorts. New York City-based. Heroic acts
info.description:
Story rules:
1.) Keep it clean.
2.) No smut allowed; no sex scenes or excessive foul language.
3.) No racism or homosexual content; including allusions.
4.) Stay true to Rockford's character traits
5.) Have fun.


Rockford Jameson watches the six o'clock evening news every morning on the HERO channel. He is the only person on the planet that can get this channel in. He must keep it a secret to continue getting broadcasts. Rockford cares about people, he has an inner drive to help others. When someone is in trouble, he is there to help. All life is precious to Rockford, being brave was not on his mind when he rescued Gabby Billings from a gun toating, trigger happy mugger and the Singer family from a home invasion that would've claimed the lives of wife Brooklyn and teenage son Albert. Rockford just had to stop it from happening.

Rockford rises at four every morning while it's still dark out, he makes up his bed, showers and eats his breakfast. It's drizzling outside, as the early risers of New York City start their week in a July that has hit record highs 3 times this year. This morning he turns on the television in his spacious, uncluttered apartment in Queens in hopes he will be able to save someone from harm once again.
